item.title: Blockchain Mesh Networks
item.description: Using the blockchain mesh network routers allow freedom and payments. The underlying core of bitcoin, the blockchain is a system that can be applied to a variety of uses. One particular disruptive use, that is not mentioned on the wiki, is mesh networks. Concept The idea and benefits are simple enough: a hardware router/device that shares a network blockchain network protocols system software network payments and transactions free of the internet boundary expanded for the internet of things (IoT) devices self-forming and healing networks get paid for expanding the network local communities cut out the middleman Architecture If you know the Open Systems Interconnections (OSI) model, the blockchain mesh network focuses on layers 1-3 (the physical, data link and network).
